Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage led the way with three wickets in his debut match as Sri Lanka beat West Indies by 73 runs
Others: Pathum Nissanka made 54 runs off 49 deliveries for Sri Lanka including a six and nine boundaries. Kusal Mendis and Kusal Perera had useful knocks of 26 and 24, respectively. Fast bowler Romario Shepherd took 2-23 for the West Indies
